mapper.update: update t_manager set userpswd = #{userpswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuts = #{stuts,jdbcType=INTEGER} where phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select phone_num, userpswd, username, email, create_time, stuts from t_manager
